name: Circular-liquid-battery-widget
tagline: An animated circular liquid battery widget for Ubersicht Mac OS X
body:
# Circular Liquid Battery Widget for Mac OS X

Do you want to have a nice battery widget for your Mac? 
Nothing more simple:
- Download Ubersicht for Mac OS X
- Download the Circular Liquid Battery Widget 
- Copy the widget into the Ubersicht widgets folder
- Enjoy!

![Circular Liquid Battery Widget Mac OS X](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zanderp/circular-liquid-battery-widget/master/screenshot.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
